Django Endless Pagination VueÂ¶

Django Endless Pagination Vue is a fork of the excellent application django-endless-pagination created for Francesco Banconi. This application get all code of version 2.0 and update for working in django >= 1.7 in addition to migrate code jquery to vue.js.

This application provides Twitter- and Digg-style pagination, with multiple and lazy pagination and optional Ajax support. It is devoted to implementing web pagination in very few steps.

The source code for this app is hosted at https://github.com/mapeveri/django-endless-pagination-vue.

Getting started is easy!
